artifacts.summary: Completed P0, P1, P2 improvements: README, testing strategy, state validator, release gating, ADR template, FMEA, OpenTelemetry guide, cost dashboard spec
Comprehensive README with quick start, architecture, security, cost model, observability, and deployment info
Enhanced PRD with Section 4.0 (Testing Strategy), Section 7.6.1-7.6.3 (Observability), Section 8 (Release Gating)

decisions.title: Prioritize P0, P1, P2 recommendations for world-class foundation
decisions.rationale: Focus on high-impact, foundational improvements that enable all future development phases

dependencies.note: Requirements documented in enhanced PRD with testing strategy and release gates

risks.description: Team may not adopt state validation script without enforcement
risks.mitigation: Add pre-commit hook that runs validate-state.py before allowing commits

risks.description: OpenTelemetry implementation may be overlooked without automated checks
risks.mitigation: Add ADOT layer check to CI/CD pipeline; fail deployment if missing

open_questions.question: Should we create initial 100-case golden set now or wait for Phase 3 (Orchestration) completion?
Which CloudWatch dashboard template should we use for ICPA-Production-Overview?

aws_constraints.network: Private subnets, no NAT, VPC endpoints
